xmpp.Stream

type
class
available in
neko, js, flash, php, node
Static stuff for creation/manipulation of XMPP stream opening/closing tags.

Static Variables

CLIENT : String

SERVER : String

STREAM : String

Static Methods

createOpenXml(ns : String, to : String, ?version : Bool, ?lang : String, ?header : Bool) : String

Creates the opening XML tag of a XMPP stream.
